text: Golubinci () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Stara Pazova municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and Croat minority and its population numbering 4,721 people (2011 census). ==Name== The name of the settlement in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Golubinci are" instead of "Golubinci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Golubinac. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Golubinci
